column4: FOr people who has both a desktop and laptop. Why not use your laptop as desktop with a monitor?
I use a desktop for gaming, processing audio etc. You can get more power for less money with a desktop and it'll last longer too.
right, fair point :) I just wonder if I should even get a seperate for both, but gaming is a fair point.
If I didn't do those things and I didn't get backache from hunching over a laptop all the time I'd certainly just spend the money on a slightly more powerful laptop, that's for sure.
